description:
Treat yourself at Bartholomew Fayre with a well-deserved pamper stop!
Hannah B Manicures will be bringing a Pop-Up Nail Bar to the heart of the festivities. Visitors can enjoy quick and stylish express manicures, the perfect way to add a little extra sparkle to your day. Take a seat, relax, and let Hannah work her magic. First come first served!

events.name: Drop in: Bartholomew Fayre: Pop Up Nail Bar
events.notes: Pop Up Nail Bar is drop-in. The Bar is likely to be popular and you may need to wait at busy times.

factsheet.heading: Bartholomew Fayre: Pop Up Nail Bar
paragraphs:
Treat yourself at Bartholomew Fayre with a well-deserved pamper stop!
Hannah B Manicures will be bringing a Pop-Up Nail Bar to the heart of the festivities. Visitors can enjoy quick and stylish express manicures, the perfect way to add a little extra sparkle to your day. Take a seat, relax, and let Hannah work her magic. First come first served!
Part of Bartholomew Fayre: Power to the People neighbourhood festival

location.address: Smithfield Rotunda Garden, West Smithfield, EC1A 9PT

name: Bartholomew Fayre: Pop Up Nail Bar
